scripts.DEPLOY-PROD: npm version major && NODE_ENV=production npx sst deploy --prod --stage prod && git add . && git commit -am 'Deployment' && git push && git push --tags
scripts.### THIS MIGHT NOT DO A PROD BUILD, BUT: MIGHT EVEN WANT TO CHANGE THE APP SO THAT --PROD IS TRUE HERE SO THAT THE STAGING SERVER IS BUILD AS THE PROD SERVER WILL BE
scripts.DEPLOY-DEV: npm version minor && npx sst deploy --stage staging && git add . && git commit -am 'Deployment' && git push && git push --tags
